topic.body: how to modfy and/or delete your site? I made a new site but the control panel for it is not popping up and /data/siteaddress from the documentation isnt working either. Wanna start from scratch from the command line

topic.title: Python question
topic.body:
Doing first ZeroNet site, prefer linux command line, everything going along nicely, try "python3 zeronet.py sitePublish mysiteaddressblahblah" keep getting a "no module named BTL in in plugins > blah > blah > "

can't find any help on this error in google.

1572739729_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac.body: Speeds were so slow on AOL and dialup and even early DSL that images and pictures were non-existent or limited at least. The web was mostly text, people talking, blogging, etc. It took 4 hours to download some shitty gif with titties as late as 1994/5. So it was decentralized, open, wild west...and you werent tracked every second, and there wasn't shitloads of data grabbing and insane code that you had to wait to load. I like this place for this reason, the fluff is taken out. There are many many things I like about the modern web, but the lack of ideas and pure anonymous text, and the fact that youre tracked every second makes me sad.

1573602860_11553Fm1cV9cYruFuVX5eLkXUMthj.body:
> [mg0](#comment_166_1LbP2cNA6NkvuFJvs7McUmv9qGjkNqVkTa): You should post the error log properly. Run the command and copy exactly what it outputs so we can help you.

python3 zeronet.py sitePublish mysiteaddress
- Starting ZeroNet...
PluginManager Plugin AnnounceBitTorrent load error: ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'BTL' in PluginManager.py line 138 > AnnounceBitTorrent/__init__.py line 1 > AnnounceBitTorrent/AnnounceBitTorrentPlugin.py line 6 > __init__.py line 13
- Libsecpk256k1 loaded: CompiledLib in 0.096s
- Patching sockets to tor socks proxy: 127.0.0.1:9050
- Version: 0.7.1 r4206, Python 3.6.8 (default, Oct  7 2019, 12:59:55) 
[GCC 8.3.0], Gevent: 1.4.0
- Loading site...
- Unhandled exception: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'settings'
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "zeronet.py", line 18, in main
    main.start()
  File "/home/hackerman/ZeroNet-linux-dist-linux64/core/src/main.py", line 537, in start
    actions.call(config.action, action_kwargs)
  File "/home/hackerman/ZeroNet-linux-dist-linux64/core/src/main.py", line 121, in call
    back = func(**kwargs)
  File "/home/hackerman/ZeroNet-linux-dist-linux64/core/src/main.py", line 381, in sitePublish
    site.settings["serving"] = True  # Serving the site even if its disabled
AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'settings'
---
Please report it: https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues/new?assignees=&labels=&template=bug-report.md
